means: [医]金刚沙：碳化硅(silicon caibide)的商品名，硬度仅次于金钢钻，用作研磨剂和耐火材料

sentence.Network_en: After setting, the surfaces of the specimens are ground down using carborundum and alumina.
sentence.Network_cn: 凝固之后, 样品表面连续用金钢砂或氧化铝磨平.

sentence.Network_en: The grinding block made of carborundum abrasive, is very hard and sharp.
sentence.Network_cn: 磨光机磨块采用金刚石磨料制成, 硬度极高,磨削锋利.

sentence.Network_en: We repair the burner brand with carborundum by the technique of ramming.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们采用碳化硅材料,利用捣打技术恢复一号炉卫燃带.
